ModMetaData.name: Ignorance Is Bliss Reborn
ModMetaData.author: Ferris, Dametri, GwinnBleidd
ModMetaData.description:
A Rewritten version of Ignorance Is Bliss
Grants control over the tech level of factions that will visit you (whether via raid or other event).
New Features: - Configure TechLevel of All Events, Incidents and Factions - Better General Configuration - Optimized core code of the mod
Notes: - Package ID will not be changed, im keeping with the original to allow compatability with old patches
Original mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2554423472
